short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the new STEM Chronos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your school day with the new and improved STEM Chronos. New features are coming such as being able to set custom period names. 

Report bugs by clicking on the flag icon on the bottom of the extension. Recommendations for improvements can be submitted through a Google form found in the description of the bug report form.
